description:
So cold it feels like walking on the moon? The insulation in the Toundra Pro CS Waterproof Winter Boots was originally developed for NASA's space program, so it provides both warmth and some astronaut cachet. Ideal for snowshoeing or for walking around in the otherworldly winter silence.

  • Waterproof leather and synthetic upper for winter durability
  • ClimaSalomon waterproof-breathable bootie construction
  • Lace-up closure with gusseted tongue allows for flex in the fit
  • Aerotherm synthetic insulation keep your feet warm
  • Synthetic fur lining adds warmth and keeps drafts out
  • Rubber toecap and heel counter offer extra protection
  • EVA midsole provides comfort
  • Non-marking Winter Contagrip rubber outsole for non-slip traction, grip and stability on snow and ice
  • Manufacturer's suggested temperature rating of -40°C for active use
name: Salomon Toundra Pro CS Waterproof Winter Boots - Men's
